config.facility.title: 設施配置
config.facility.help.use_vanilla_fonts: 在儲存畫面中使用Minecraft字體
config.facility.help.utb_cat1_rate: Max items transferred each tick;by category 1 universal transport bus
config.facility.help.utb_cat1_import_coo: Freqeuncy of transfers for UTB-1 Importer;1 = every tick, 20 = every second;Higher values may protect server performance
block.facility.utb1_intake.desc: Pulls items onto UTB1 carrier from a single block/side.
block.facility.utb1_intake_g: Storage to Bus Adapter, Illuminated - UTB.1
block.facility.utb1_intake_g.desc: Pulls items onto UTB1 carrier from a single block/side.
block.facility.utb1_export.desc: Deposits items from UTB1 carrier into a single block/side.
block.facility.utb1_export_g: Bus to Storage Adapter, Illuminated - UTB.1
block.facility.utb1_export_g.desc: Deposits items from UTB1 carrier into a single block/side.
block.facility.crate.desc: Holds 2048 items in any combination.;NOT compatible with hoppers.
block.facility.hyper_crate.desc: 內部空間更大;與漏斗不相容
block.facility.slotted_crate.desc: 可堆疊32個物品;與漏斗兼容
block.facility.creative_crate.desc: For testing.;Will output random items given redstone signal.
block.facility.bin_1x.desc: Holds 2048 of a single item.;Front display & convenient access.
block.facility.bin_2x.desc: Holds 1024 each of two items.;Front display & convenient access.
block.facility.bin_4x.desc: Holds 512 each of four items.;Front display & convenient access.
block.facility.creative_bin_1x.desc: Endless supply of single item.;For testing.
block.facility.creative_bin_2x.desc: Endless supply of two items.;For testing.
block.facility.creative_bin_4x.desc: Endless supply of four items.;For testing.
